content: STATUS: Chosen by Companion Senta—now Herald-trainee, must report to Haven. PHYSICAL: Gift-shock from forcibly awakened Mage-Gift—burned-open mental channels causing white-hot agony, blurred vision, teetering sanity. Bond with Senta beginning to stabilize channels but requires Healing. COMMITMENT: Sworn to report evidence of organized threat (red robes/Menmellith direction) to Haven without rest.

IDENTITY: Unpartnered Companion mare for 3 years (adult status), silver hooves, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane. CHANGE: Chose Rance—bonded. STATE: Can mind-speak with Chosen; senses magic; travels 3x distance of ordinary horses. ARC: Found her Chosen in catastrophic circumstances—dealing with stubborn, grief-stricken partner who doesn't yet understand he caused destruction himself. STANCE-Rance: Chosen bond—unconditional love, exasperation at stubbornness, protective. Blocking his self-destructive impulses while guiding him toward survival/training. Firm: 'You are never alone again.' Knows he has immensely powerful Gift (type unknown), triggered by trauma.

STANCE-Rance: Bond deepened through journey—moved from frustrated duty to genuine attachment. Felt his affection when he nuzzled her, recognized caring beneath his granite exterior. Now fiercely protective, refuses separation even when exhausted. Sees him as true partner ('we face it together'). STANCE-Rolan: Met briefly at Haven arrival, accepted his greeting but prioritized staying with Rance over rest.

STANCE-Rance: Identified his Mage-Gift during chamber crisis. Stands beside/touches him constantly. Contingency partner—will knock him out if control lost.

STANCE-Rolan: Coordinating through Companion network during crisis.

STATE: Coat dulled from hard travel. Exhausted but vigilant.

STATE: Maintained guard outside cottage during Rance and Talia's intimacy, attempting to give privacy while unable to fully shield from their bond connection. ARC: Witnessed/sensed the unprecedented development between her Chosen and the Queen's Own. Initial embarrassment gave way to resigned acceptance of complications. STANCE-Rance: Concerned about his untrained Mage-Gift use (telekinesis with excessive force). Dry humor about complications. STANCE-Talia: Sensed her complete surrender and discovered desires even the memory-merge hadn't revealed.

Village obliterated—nothing but ash, charred timber fragments, scorched foundations. Crater at epicenter where Rance collapsed. Bodies at edge: villagers being carried off when caught in blast. Valdemaran village near shared borders with Karse, Rethwellan, Menmellith.

Organized threat, not random bandits. Wore red robes hidden under bandit garb. Attacked Lisle, incapacitated and carried off villagers. Fled toward Menmellith after Rance's Gift awakened. Purpose unknown—triggered catastrophic magical response.

Herald-basics (knowledge of roles, protocols, Gift types) flow naturally through bond without explicit teaching. Bond strengthens over time—thoughts/emotions become clearer as minds open to each other. Creates 'something greater than sum of parts.'

Stories of ritual sacrifice/blood magic/demon summoning are historical fact, not myth. 'Fires of Vkandis Sunlord' consumed many 'impure souls' over centuries. Officially banned in Karse for decades—current revival implies major policy shift.

Queen's Own Companion. Greeted Senta at Haven arrival, offered support and reassurance about Healers. Powerful mindvoice.

Entered Circle without Chosen—unprecedented. Stood beside Rance throughout report, lending legitimacy. Sapphire eyes inscrutable. Coordinated with Senta during crisis. Presence reassures Circle members.
departed Waystation at Menmellith border after examining evidence

STATE: Overwhelmed but stable after mind-merge. Rance helped her confront buried trauma—arranged marriage, Empathy training struggles, decades of isolation/self-doubt, fear of losing identity to Gift. Emotionally vulnerable but "better state than before." With Crescent for recovery.

STANCE-Rance: Complete intimacy—he lived her entire life. Kissed by him to close merge. Trusts him with her vulnerabilities + role. He has all her memories/knowledge.

ARC: First time allowing someone to share her burdens. Walls between compartmentalized self dissolving.

STANCE-Rance: Seeks his counsel before presenting decisions to Selenay—treating him as collaborative partner rather than subordinate despite rank difference. Comfortable visiting his isolated cottage alone at dawn. Shifted from vulnerable confusion to decisive action overnight regarding shared-memory situation. Uses formal Court cadence when discussing matters of weight.

STATE: No longer a virgin—hymen torn, breast bitten/marked, filled with Rance's seed. Body marked with evidence that will be hidden beneath her Whites when she meets Selenay. ARC: Discovered she responds intensely to domination, rough treatment, and degradation—finds release in surrender after years of carrying responsibility. Broke through her terror of losing herself in another person. Used crude language and Holderkin degradation vocabulary that she'd rejected for decades. Experienced two powerful orgasms. The careful control and diplomatic mask she maintained for years was thoroughly shattered.

STANCE-Rance: Grateful for warning but calculating risk—he has ALL Talia's knowledge (state secrets, vulnerabilities). Declined his offered mind-touch. Wine preference detail confirmed his claim uncomfortably.

STANCE-Talia: Concerned for her recovery/capability as Queen's Own.

KNOWS: First Herald-Mage since Vanyel. Karsite blood magic threat. Security vulnerability—two people with Queen's Own knowledge.

Complete memory-merge between Rance+Talia—should have killed both or caused permanent insanity. Rance stabilized her using raw Mage-Gift + instinct. Results: Total memory/knowledge exchange. Rance has Talia's lifetime training, state secrets, muscle memory (walks with her gait). She has his Lisle memories. Creates security vulnerability—two people with Queen's Own knowledge.

First Herald-Mage since Vanyel (centuries). Manifests as energy blasts + impossible mental feats (forced merge, stabilization). No living teachers—training must be improvised from archives. Rance uses Talia's shielding techniques through untrained channels (painful but functional). Circle sealed info—public cover maintains normal trainee status.

Special forces conducted Lisle raid disguised as Menmellith bandits. Military-grade recent weapons (officer issue). Took live captives (all ages) across border—blood magic/demon summoning suspected. Red-robed Sun-Priests involved. Represents return to officially condemned practices + potential policy shift. Cyclical extremism pattern during internal instability (per Myste). Motive unclear—coordinated multi-nation attack or Valdemar-specific.

Old cottage. Remote enough to contain Mage-Gift incidents without leveling Collegium. Close enough to avoid isolation. Allows discreet meetings. Assigned as Rance's quarters by Circle (cover for why trainee not in dorms).
